CHAPTER 13 " Good going , "[864-a long - haired kid dressed in the same t - shirt as annie] said [a long - haired kid dressed in the same T - shirt as [Annie]46-annie]864-a long - haired kid dressed in the same t - shirt as annie . CHAPTER 14 Suddenly [Annie]46-annie 's resolve to keep [Zack]56-zack at arm 's length seemed juvenile . [They]917-they were [adults]918-adults after all — [two adults irresistibly attracted to [one another]920-one another]919-two adults irresistibly attracted to one another in a purely physical way . Forget about long - term , [Annie]46-annie , just live for now . For wanting [you]46-annie . Those three little words sent goosebumps skipping across [her]46-annie skin in anticipation of what [he]56-zack 'd do to [her]46-annie when [they]917-they got [home]184-home . But [the Ferrari]7-the ferrari was n't heading [home]184-home . At least , not [[her]46-annie home]923-her home . [Security fences hiding mansions belonging to [the filthy rich]925-the filthy rich]924-security fences hiding mansions belonging to the filthy rich slipped past [her]46-annie window at high speed as [they]917-they roared through [the streets of [Beverly Hills]32-beverly hills]926-the streets of beverly hills . Finally , [they]917-they pulled into [a long drive hidden by trees and hedges]927-a long drive hidden by trees and hedges . Electric gates closed with a clang behind [the car]763-the car . [Annie]46-annie craned [her]46-annie head to catch a glimpse of [[his]56-zack house]929-his house . [She]46-annie 'd been dying to see [it]929-his house ever since [she]46-annie 'd read about it in [House]930-house and [Garden]33-garden . Okay , if [she]46-annie were honest , [she]46-annie was more excited about being alone with [Zack]56-zack in [[his]56-zack house]929-his house than seeing [the building]840-the building and [gardens]933-gardens . Who gave a flying fig about bricks and mortar when [they]917-they got invited back to [the house of [a man of [Zack DiMarco]56-zack 's caliber]935-a man of zack dimarco 's caliber]934-the house of a man of zack dimarco 's caliber ?
